["DescriptionSTUDIO ONE
-100% Registration Fee Waiver
-Project Handed Over
-90% Payment to be made upon Handover
The bustling and energetic Dubai Marina is the world's largest man-made marina with seven kilometers of pedestrian walkways. The development is the most in demand waterfront community in Dubai and amongst one of the most sought after in the region. It includes residential, hospitality, retail and entertainment offerings for residents and visitors to explore and indulge in.
Pedestrian walkways are woven all through the community, with the renowned Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR) situated just minutes away, providing easy access to the shore. The area includes a rich selection of restaurants with diverse cuisines of the world located along the Marina Walk. In addition, five star hotels are integrated throughout the surrounding community, as well as salons and spas for both men and women. Entertainment options and shopping areas are in abundance all through Dubai Marina, with a dedicated mall serving the community, as well as cinemas showing the latest global blockbusters.
-Development approved for mortgage 
-Location in the most sought after Dubai Marina community
-Wide array of retail and recreation options available on ground level
-Convenient access to public transportation"]

First floor - Large family area, 5 bedrooms with balconies & en-suites, Master bedroom with walk-in closet & en-suite with bath & shower with balcony over looking the Polo field.
Garden - Landscaped with lush greens, huge private pool and Jacuzzi plotted with beautiful Palm Trees.
Call Conor on +971567913312.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxury living with world class amenities!
Experience the best Ras Al Khaimah has to offer with Al Hamra Village Community – pristine private beaches, an 18-hole championship golf course, 5-star resorts, Al Hamra Marina, Al Hamra Mall and Al Hamra Sailing Club.
This 3 Bedroom home is fully equipped with the following features and amenities:
Modern kitchen
Modern washrooms
Fully furnished with world-class amenities
Access to swimming pools and open kids play area 
Spacious living areas
Centralized A/C
Gate control systems with 24-hour security
Pet-friendly and award winning community
Close to shopping mall and international school
Covered car parking
Peaceful and safe environment 
Bayti meaning ‘My home’ is the true sense of family home. Set in the heart of Al Hamra Village, the selection of 3 and 4 bedrooms residences embrace the true essence of community living. Bayti homes provide spacious living inside the home and offers activities for the entire family. Close to the beach, Marina, Golf Course and a Shopping mall there is something to do all the time. 
REMS
PO Box 30019 Ras Al Khaimah, UAE+97172028777
www.rems.ae']

descriptions:
["DescriptionThe Valley's first villa / Townhouse community, Eden is designed to elevate your every day.
3- & 4-bedroom villas in three architectural styles.
LIVE OUT YOUR DREAMS, TOGETHER
The Town Centre will bring together indoor and outdoor dining experiences, handpicked retail stores, as well as bustling markets to entertain the whole family.
THE LIFESTYLE OF YOUR DREAM AWAITS
At The Valley, Emaar has put together its finest minds to bring you the best-in-class family amenities that have never been seen before in the region.
With well-shaded walkable streets, generous green spaces and an array of exceptional amenities, you and your loved ones will live the lifestyle you have always dreamed of.
The Valley is envisioned as a new quaint town.
It is comprised of a network of residential neighbourhoods through tributaries of lush greenery, forging a network of green open spaces and best-in-class community amenities that have never before been seen in the region.
The design concept stems from the desire to establish a strong sense of community family living, equipped with retail, entertainment, recreational, educational and health facilities.
This makes The Valley the perfect place for residents and their loved ones to power their dreams, becoming the next generation of UAE’s innovators and change-makers.
The Valley by Emaar is a Freehold property in Dubai with 100% ownership and a title deed that allows you to get residency visa in Dubai. Easy instalment plan with no interest.
SPECIAL LAUNCH OFFER:
------------------------------------
*70/30 - 30 Months Post Completion Payment Plan
*50% DLD Fee Waiver
Let's talk
--
Call Khaled Shamma on +971508492962
(Arabic / English)
BRN 32968
--
Dubai, UAE, ORN 12312"]
